channel.title: EpicCraft!, 24/7, Towns, Citys, Bukkit server, Plug-ins
channel.description:
Welcome all you need to do to get white listed is, go to this website [b]http://epiccraft-survival.enjin.com/home/[/b] and sign up then post a forum in the forum group then we will see your application and we will add you The plug-ins are, Factions, ChestShop, iConomy, lockette, Anti Cheat, and more!
Staff are friendly and understanding! :) :D IP: 178.239.170.106:25566 But remember to sign up and post on fourms at: http://epiccraft-survival.enjin.com/home
